select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review_tb (REV_NUM,ORD_DETAIL_NUM,MEM_EMAIL,CM_NUM,REV_CONTENT,REV_RATED,REV_DATE,REV_VIEWS,REV_ORIGIN,REV_UPLOAD) values(#{revNum}, #{ordDetailNum}, #{memEmail}, #{cmNum}, #{revContent}, #{revRated}, sysdate, 0, #{revOrigin}, #{revUpload})
mapper.select: select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTEN,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE order by a.REV_DATE;

select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTENT,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME,c.STO_NUM STO_NUM from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE order by a.REV_DATE) board) where (rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}) and (MEM_EMAIL =#{memEmail})

select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select a.REV_NUM REV_NUM,a.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL,a.REV_CONTENT REV_CONTENT,a.REV_RATED REV_RATED,a.REV_DATE REV_DATE,a.REV_UPLOAD REV_UPLOAD,c.PRD_NAME PRD_NAME,c.STO_NUM STO_NUM from review_tb a left join order_tb b on a.ORD_DETAIL_NUM= b.ORD_DETAIL_NUM left join product_tb c on b.PRD_CODE = c.PRD_CODE order by a.REV_DATE) board) where STO_NUM = #{stoNum}
